subject: Box user concerns.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
--_61ee291f-7f5c-4ad5-8088-8539e6b72f20_
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable


 It's not that concerns are not considered, I think no one knows what to d=
o with it. There's not enough box users, and ITC researchers out there to r=
eally good feel for what the pitfalls are. So far after seven years of EVP/=
ITC work I can say onlly that these dark entities, or wahtever it is talk b=
ad, and threaten, and that's about all they do. They threaten, I tell them =
to bring it, and....nothin'! Paper tigers I say. 
 
 As far as some fears t=
hat portals are opened, and all kinds of evil comes in, I don't believe tha=
t either. They are already have full access, they already exist in more dem=
ensions, making this physical level about the lowest level of spiritual exi=
stence/evolution. Just about all these worries are old fear crap to keep pe=
ople in church. 
 
 I don't think it's fair to with hold the stuff cuz of a=
 few nut jobs, you have the same problem with everything from bicycles to a=
irplanes. 
 
 I had that concern about selling my boxes, but how would you =
screen users? You can't. Not everyone can use a quija board, and not too ma=
ny unbalanced ding dongs get in trouble with those anyway.
 
 Frank-S


To:=
 EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.comFrom: babiarz3@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 19:5=
8:45 +0000Subject: [EVP-ITC] Re: Family hour around the radio




I am a fa=
irly quiet person, most of the time. I have my thoughts andopinions on topi=
cs but feel strongly about "to each his own". Unlesssomething strikes me as=
 completely wrong, I won't debate. No one herehas heard from me other than =
recently with this mini-box yet, I amhere several times weekly reading and =
offering my energy in support ofthe research.However...something is strikin=
g me here and again, I can't keep mymouth shut. The discussion about the fa=
mily hour with the box has ledthe way for people to mention negativity and =
even "the dark guys" canbe fun if not taken seriously.I ask you to consider=
 the fact that many who purchase the mini-boxwill not be of the right frame=
 of mind. Most will not be in harmony.Many will take "the dark guys" seriou=
sly. Yet, you feel it's a goodidea to let anyone who wants a box have one? =
All in the name ofsharing technology.I know that my previous posts expressi=
ng my concern over the massmarketing of the box, was barely given considera=
tion. Realize that Iam not being selfish- I do not own a box. EVP is my pas=
sion and hasbeen from day one 6 years ago when I jumped fully into the fiel=
d. I amsuccessful in capturing EVP, always have been. I still do it the "ol=
dfashioned way" with open air techniques. Would I love to be able tohold re=
al time 2 way communications with the other side? Of course.However, I do n=
ot think enough research into the possibilities hasbeen done to warrant the=
 approval let alone production of these boxes. Those of us who have been on=
 countless investigations with many peoplewill quickly admit that there are=
 some people we'd rather notinvestigate with. When they are present, negati=
ve things tend tohappen. We all know one or two people who we can say "felt=
 dark" fromthe first meeting. We all admit that being mentally sound is ani=
mportant quality in this field. If you have mental issues, this maynot be t=
he area of research for you. We don't bring children oninvestigations for o=
bvious reasons. BUT! If you want a box that couldpossibly open up a portal =
and bridge the gap between here and thedark, sure! Anyone who wants one sho=
uld have it! You might feel that I am over reacting or being overly dramati=
c.That's fine. My concern is not what you think of me but that youconsider =
the possibilities here. Many of which we do not know. Can yoube 100% sure t=
hat this is a good idea or that it's worthy of saying"well, we'll see what =
happens"? --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday<paranormalinvestig=
ating@...> wrote:>> Bill,> > You have the right idea, I recently have dealt=
 with a lot> of negativity from my Frank's box. Harmony is very important> =
as is the right frame of mind before turning the box on.> > hope you & the =
family had a good holiday.> > Bruce> > Bruce Halliday Paranormal Investigat=
ing Team > > > To: EVP-ITC@...: vilhellm@...: Fri, 23 Nov 2007 02:46:20+000=
0Subject: [EVP-ITC] Family hour around the radio> > > > > Maybe we're just =
a little unconventional in our household, but mostof us here are pretty ope=
n to the idea of the multiverse. Gathering ina circle around our Frank's Bo=
x is our idea of quality family time.The messages are relevent, the interes=
t is high, and we're very wellgrounded and do not let the tricksters push u=
s around.HappyThanksgiving from our home to yours. -Bill > > > > > > > ____=
______________________________________________________> Connect and share i=
n new ways with Windows Live.>http://www.windowslive.com/connect.html?ocid=
=3DTXT_TAGLM_Wave2_newways_112007>
